endpoints.description: The Google Adsense API allows you to input a google adsense identifier and get a list of domains that share the same identifier.
endpoints.name: Adsense

endpoints.description: The Google Analytics API allows you to input a Google Analytics identifier and get a list of domains that share the same identifier.
endpoints.name: Analytics

endpoints.description: The Domain API allows you to input a domain and get a list of domains that share the same identifiers (Google Adsense, Google Analytics, IP Address, Nameserver). Output is limited to 100 domains per identifier.
endpoints.name: Domain

endpoints.description: The Domains on Nameserver API allows you to input a nameserver and get a list of domains handled by this nameserver.
endpoints.name: Domains on Nameserver

endpoints.description: The IP Address API allows you to input an IP address and get a list of domains hosted on this IP address
endpoints.name: IP Address

endpoints.description: The Nameservers on IP Address API allows you to input an IP address and get a list of nameservers using this IP address.
endpoints.name: Nameservers on IP Address

endpoints.description: The Request Summary API allows you to input a domain name and get the number of domains with the same Google Adsense, Google Analytics identifiers, IP Address, and Nameserver
endpoints.name: Summary

info.description: SpyOnWeb.com takes the information from public sources, then structures it for your quick and convenient search for the websites that probably belong to the same owner. Our web crawler picks out the following data: ip address, google adsense id, google analytics id.
info.name: SpyOnWeb
